website_summaries.verdict: For illuminating smaller spaces like entryways, stairwells or closets, this chandelier provides good light. Users loved the glamorous accent this light provides at a sub-$40 price point.
pros: Single-light chandelier illuminates hallways, small room, closet, entry or stairwell
Takes up to a 100-watt chandelier light bulb
Genuine crystal center ball and strand ends, with replacement crystal included just in case one breaks
cons: Assembly can be a bit tedious, with almost 60 strands to attach to the base – a step that should be done before wiring up the fixture
Measuring less than 10 inches long, it’s smaller and gives off less light than some expected – though the size of the space being illuminated makes a difference

website_summaries.verdict: Combines a modern look and superior quality in an affordable and easy to install fixture.
pros: Installs easily, and comes with extra parts “just in case.” Great price
cons: Instructions don’t go into a whole lot of detail
Assembly in general is not difficult, but is time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Had to install prior to assembly but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Had to install prior to assembly but I was evenly pleasantly surprised to find out how easy the assembly was even after the wires and light fixture had been hung..... the price is definitely worth it! Love this product.... packages were clearly labeled for each set of teardrops. This made it very easy to assemble and the directions were clear. If you do assemble after the fixture is hung, I recommend hanging crystals in reverse order working your way back from the center to the edge.....overall excellent buy, looks gorg. in my Glam room!
customer_reviews.author: ToyToy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but VERY SMALL. I order this for my office but it's way too small and will need to go in a much smaller space. It only took about 15-20 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: awingate

customer_reviews.title: Soooo gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing chandeliers!! They look beautiful in my closet! Don't hesitate!! Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.author: A Foster

customer_reviews.title: Shine Bright Like A Diamond!...
customer_reviews.text: I Loveeee chandeliers!!!! I laughed at this cheap little light but took a chance on it. Had my brother install this in my half bath. It looks so AMAZING! The crystals are glass and the reflected pattern looks pretty on the ceiling. Gives my half bathroom the girly sparkly Hollywood glam i was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Bgood

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this small chandelier, I put one in my entryway and the other at the top of my stairs, they're beautiful, the only thing I would definitely tell future buyers is sit down and your kitchen table, or a very well lit area with a flat surface and put all of the stands on before hanging it, it's very easy this way, if you hang it first, it will take you double the time, trust me, we tried it both ways and I won... but other then that it's perfect. Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Fent211

customer_reviews.title: horrible instructions, FANTASTIC LOOK
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt, horrible instructions, FANTASTIC LOOK. Definitely worth it and you don't find flushmount lights for this cheap, power through you can do this
customer_reviews.author: MasterMatthew

customer_reviews.title: SUPER IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: Installing this was a breeze. My husband said that it was basic. Installing the crystals was tedious, but with both of us doing it, it took only a couple of minutes the reflection and brilliance this gives off is fantastic!! We put in an LED bright white bulb, and the light refraction just dances all over the place. We put it in our daughter’s room, which didn’t need a huge light source (she has a lamp next to her bed for reading), and this exceeded our expectations. Save your cash, and your time, and end your search here!!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently painted our living and dining room and foyer. We wanted a light to add zing to the foyer, and this was the perfect choice. It is small, would not recommend it for a large room by itself, but for our foyer, small rooms and the like it is gorgeous, looks very expensive and really made the foyer look elegant. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is gorgeous and so worth the money. You have to install the crystals yourself, but they come clearly labeled so you know where everything is supposed to go. Installing them is fairly easy. It is like hanging keys on a small key wire key ring. Took me about 30 minutes to install them all. The electrician didn't have any problems installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Bett Sundermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Looks more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I got this for my entryway and am very pleased with it. I will say, I used the recommended 40 watt bulb and it really doesn't give off much light at all since it's just a 1 bulb fixture. I'll probably just stick a 60 watt in there next time I change it. It has a sticker on there that says 100 watt max. Also, the directions for installation are junk. My husband tried following them and got really frustrated because they made no sense. He eventually just set them aside and figured it out on his own and got it done within minutes after that. This fixture is absolutely perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small and hard to install.
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised soo many being satisfied with this. It's cheap. Are you familiar with the cheapest metal d-rings ever made. Yeah, like the ones used on rental key tags, that's what connects each piece. It's also smaller than appears. Shame on me for not measuring I guess. It' also a pain in the @*% to install. You have to string each strand one by one. I'd give it lower stars but I'll take responsibility for the sizing disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Fuller

customer_reviews.title: OMG I can't say enough about how fun it was to put it together and having it ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought two of these! when people see these, i always ask what they think i paid for it! they say $400! lol I bought for $36. I have one in my bedroom and one in my office. OMG I can't say enough about how fun it was to put it together and having it up on my ceilings...oh so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Brodi Kalish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter's room!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's room to replace an ugly ceiling fan/light. It was easy to install, and I had no issues hanging all the pieces once the fixture was in place. I really liked that they included several extra pieces - just in case. My daughter was thrilled! If you are like me and struggle to find the right light bulbs... I'll save you a few minutes and tell you an E12 is a candelabra base. I used a 60 watt, crystal clear, candelabra base.
customer_reviews.author: mani

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase of this style and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It’s my second time purchasing this style off amazon. The first time was in my previous home and I liked it so much I bought another one for my new place. This chandelier is chic and classy and most importantly CHEAP. At Home Depot this would be 3 times the cost it is on here. Everyone is shocked when I tell them how much I really paid. One star off because install can be a little difficult and it also takes weird bulbs that I had trouble finding
customer_reviews.author: TSdwi

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This small but impressive chandelier is perfect for my walk in closet. I brought 2 and they are well made and very cute. It was the perfect size I wanted not to big but not to small. It has some plastic and some crystal beads. The crystal one are the bigger nicer ones. I'm glad i found this great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I always read reviews when I purchase online and look for pictures as I find that to truly be helpful. I remember one poster said the light was smaller than expected. I expected to be disappointed but for me this light was just the right size. The assembly was the worst for me. Not hard, just tedious. Probably took me 10-20 mins to slide the dangly things on each hole. ( Its like putting a key on a key ring). The most frustrating part of that was some of the dangly things would fall off during install. But Tadddddaaaaaa!!!!-Hubby installed so I have no idea how that goes, but it took him 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great little chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful little chandelier. When I first got it and realized I had to hook on all of the single strands I was like oh my gosh But it was actually pretty easy and I think it took me 30 minutes. The instructions are a little vague unless you know about electrical work, which I'm a beginner. So after a few YouTube videos it was fairly easy to install. It is pretty heavy with all of the beads hanging but it seems to not have a problem with the weight and hangs beautifully. I would recommend this and I would definitely purchase it again or for another room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: The sparkle reflecting on the ceiling is so beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Quick, safe delivery, and well packaged, and low price. We assembled the well made hanging crystals using patience, but not difficult. Hung light in our small foyer using a 40 watt tear drop light. The sparkle reflecting on the ceiling is so beautiful. . . Looks very expensive. You won't be disappointed! Just the look I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Staczek

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install but a pain otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily where existing figure was before. However, we had to get the bulbs for it after we took it out of the box and found out that what type the were. This delayed installation another 4 days as we had to order the bulbs from Amazon). Then it took two days for us to get all the gems hung. There is a tiny tiny ring to hook them on and you have to open this jewelry style jump ring first then try to maneuver it just right to catch the loop - tedious work. It’s pretty once it’s up but I would not order another one. BTW- the light bulbs were $12+ for 6.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good for its price ... But: All the strings provided to install the crystals fell apart as I was installing those crystals. I had to go to the hardware store and buy small wires for the hanging crystals. And it is not real Crystal it is made of very good quality plastic. It takes a while to install all these crystals and as I said some of the wires provided fell As I was completing the installation and therefore some crystals broke. Luckily, there were some extra parts provided. Once installed in the room it looks cute and OK.
customer_reviews.author: B4uBy

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a small chandelier, BUY this
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is my Best Buy on amazon since 2009. For real. I was so worried it would look cheap like I’ve seen in my friends homes for the 50$ they’ve spent or so on one but NO. It’s GORGEOUS. It totally brought together my small bathroom. IM IN LOVE. If you’re comparing between others... get this one. I can’t even think of a way to improve it. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Miles

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. I have 2 of them now. The only thing that bothered me was the blank square you see on the silver in all the pictures online. That is not on the units you receive, it's silver all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Easy to assemble and install. My husband did it himself in about 20 minutes. Had no trouble with screws not fitting. The crystals are plastic except for the big one but that did not take away from the beauty of it at all. I do need to switch out my bulb for a brighter one but I was too impatient and grabbed one from my other chandelier. Overall great purchase, will buy again for other small areas that need some glam.
customer_reviews.author: Tkarina

customer_reviews.title: Besides difficult to install, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this, but it was not easy to install. The screws were too long so I had them filed down. Installed on a pull switch light fixture so we put in a wireless switch. It is a little heavy once assembled, and you do need to assemble it yourself, but that is not difficult. It comes with extra strands just in case.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I chose well with this light. It's the perfect size for my bathroom. Really pretty and gives off good light. Super easy to assemble (15mins). Easy to install (15mins). Well worth the price (on sale yay!). I did the whole process with plastic gloves on because I didn't want to leave prints all over. I hope that it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not super bright
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok, but definitely not a bright light. I installed this into our walk-in closet to give it a classier look. It provides that, however the single bulb isn’t super bright. We got a 40 watt equivalent bulb and returned it for a 60 watt equivalent. It’s better and fine for a 7x14ft closet. I would not use this in a bedroom as it just isn’t enough light. Ps, you have to install each strand of crystals. It takes a good 30+ minutes to do this.
customer_reviews.author: BRW

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to put in my master closet and messed up. It is not what so ever bright. Even with the brightest light bulb on the market. I thought I read it had two slots for light bulbs when it really only has one. The light bulb is right in the center facing down like it’s pointing. I wish I would have gotten something brighter. It is quite cute though but very small for a chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlovejp

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for with this one.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so surprised this light got so many great reviews to begin with. First off, it was not easy to install, assemble was easy, not the installation especially with the terrible instructions. Secondly, it's much smaller than imagined and the room I got it for is a small walk in closet so I wanted it kinda small just didn't realize how small it would appear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great looking... takes a little quite time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the price.... just amazing... really good quality for the price. It's inexpensive because you do have to hook every single "jewel" to the body that attaches to the ceiling... but if you take your time, it's not too bad.. but had to do it on a latter.... however, it's very good quality and can't believe how many people who see it love it. Changed the whole look of our hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this beautiful chandelier! It is worth every penny. I bought it to add some bling and glam to my already-very-classy grooming shop and everyone is head over heels in love with it. It is perfect! I cut the wires and hardware off and only use it as a chandelier, not as an "actual light". It hangs over a small play area and even babies love to look at it! Despite it being plastic and cheap, it still casts beusitudl rainbows on the walls and truly looks like glass / crystal (when hung up and not viewed closely, of course.) I'll add photos when our remodel is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Gerke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look of these
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look of these! They look a lot more expensive than they are. The base is a mirror, so when you stand under it, it looks like the strands go way up into the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty in PrimeTop Contributor: Women's Fashion

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: This is just beyond words in it's beauty. We sprayed the base an oil rubbed bronze to match our hinges, knobs, etc. It looks great! To put the crystals on, pinch the loops between your thumb and first finger and squeeze to make this process a lot easier. Look at the images on the item sale page to see what I mean here. I added a photo of the bulb we used as well. The light projected on the ceiling is marvelous! BUY THIS CHANDELIER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have it in a bathroom even though it's not technically approved for one. Hoping it won't get rusty if we run the fan for a while after showers. I do love it though! It adds so much glam. And it's so inexpensive that even if it does start to rust, it would be worth it. As all are saying, it does take time to assemble but once it's done, it's done. I was afraid it might be a little on the small side because we do have a good sized bathroom but it's perfectly fine. Creates plenty of light too. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gem
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp is perfect. I bought the another chandelier and it was acrylic, more expensive, didn’t work, so cheaply made everything was falling apart. However, I then got this one I followed the very easy instructions exchanged Some of the Chrystals for colorful Chrystals and colorful glass pieces, which is super easy and made it look the way I wanted. I was going for a Gypsy look. I luv my lamps. I did the electrical myself and even that was easy.
customer_reviews.author: julie lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. No problems with assembly or installation
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded our expectations. Very nice. No problems with assembly or installation. A 60 watt bulb is a lot of light. Will either put on a dimmer or get a lower wattage bulb. Crystals are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: peterj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my laundry room! It is small, so best for a small space. I didn't find the crystals too hard to attach, another review recommended pinching the rings to open them, and that worked really well. It look me less than 15 minutes to get them all on with that method. Installation was straightforward, but the instructions were lacking so definitely look up a YouTube video or something before starting if you aren't familiar with replacing light fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars, Really Lights up the Room
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, bought this for my nursery. Went with a woodland theme but still needed a little Glitz, this was it! Especially for the price. Chandelier is rather heavy once assembled. You need to put the bulb in, hook the the little bead strings into the holes all around the light, so it’s a little time consuming but definitely worth it. Compare prices to Menards, Lowe’s etc this is a win. My guests always ask about it, I let them think it was more expensive. I’ll probably get a 2nd and 3rd one for our hallways since it’s so glamorous and lightens up the room (no pun intended 🤣)
customer_reviews.author: C & O

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put crystals on, finished product is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So this was not the easiest thing to install and each one of those crystal hanging pieces had to be added on like a keychain which took foorrrevvverrr. BUT at the price, you cannot beat the look that the finished product offers. It really does like pretty nice in my smaller condo for the dining area, I'm super happy with the end results! Just a warning, this is a couple of hours project... And using needle nose pliers to loop on the crystals can help w timing!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: What a great light for the money!!! It took me about 15 minutes from start to finish to install. I put the crystals on the base before hanging it... just my preference. Counting the crystals and matching them to the directions made it easy to map out which goes where! I love this light! I have this installed on a 2 way switch and it works fine. Love it love it for the $ spent!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Why not? Mini but shinning like a star.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was fun assemble all the parts if you have patience. I bought some pigtails connect to the chandelier. Dont need to buy the whole recessed light converter. And I actually hang up the metal bar with cable ties - girl ways. Because I can't drill a hole on the ceiling :)) My boyfriend said it wasnt proper way but I made it work rather than wait for months to have him do it. Anyway, I was happy with these mini chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Boccio

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had read some previous reviews about the crystals being plastic but they are not, they are good quality. A bit cumbersome to assembly and mount but well worth it. The crystals use a split ring to attach to a loop vs hooks. Pros and cons include they will hold tighter but were a bit hard to assemble. I put all the crystals on before mounting it. That also got a bit tough because you have to connect the wires and connect to the mounts with all the beads. All in all it is a fantastic light and I am really happy that I made this purchase and installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Flannery-Day

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty and even though it has to be assembled, it didn't take too long and was not as hard as some have reported. Remember everyone has different ideas of what "labor" and "time" means😜. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it! (Beautiful Chandelier)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. A little small for a bedroom in my opinion but the chandelier is gorgeous and my Daughter absolutely loved it, she had no complaints. Must attach each crystal individually, so it's a little time consuming but well worth it and my Daughter and I attached the crystals together so we cut the time in half.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Fixture
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions would make you think that it is quite small. Once you assemble it, you will no longer think that. I bought two of these for a hallway and they are the perfect size. I based my decision on one of the reviews here on Amazon. They posted a picture of these in a large closet. They looked great. I am so glad I bought them. I will add pictures later.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier light
customer_reviews.text: Assembly required! I didn't realize I had to add all the beads. But it was easy. Took maybe 20 minutes. I also ordered led bulbs that are comparable to 100 watt bulbs and it's so bright! It's gorgeous and I love it! I ordered it for my daughters walk in closet that's being built. It's very elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Would get them again if I had somewhere else to put them.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Took me about 15 mins per light. All the different tiers are in their own baggie together. Start from the outside and work your way in toward the center. Install was easy just line up the screws. Sturdy? It’s a ceiling light not a table or floor lamps outs not like anyone’s bumping into them. Super cute and so glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Alana-G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light! But not the brightest.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Extremely beautiful light. -Looks great in person. -Cheap, but doesn’t look it. -simple assembly (see also in cons) Cons: - 1 bulb (may not be bright enough to light a whole room depending on bulb/size of room.) -some assembly required. Pretty simple, just attach the hanging pieces, they are packaged by size. HOWEVER, if you have poor coordination, elderly, poor sight, it may be difficult to assemble. This light may or may not seem to small depending on the room and how many lights, check the size before you buy! I enjoy it! 4/5 due to brightness
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Great value and beautiful lights for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So like the other reviews stated, these are plastic crystals and it’s a mini chandelier but honestly, I couldn’t be happier. I installed two in my walk in closet and the LED lights brighten the room up like it’s daytime. They’re perfect! Good packaging and they even send an extra strand for each different row of crystals. Well done and beautiful for the price.
customer_reviews.author: OverTheMoon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the lighting fixture in our nursery and it's perfect. It was easy to install and were able to put it on a dimmer switch. This is great for the application we chose, but I could see this working great in a hallway as well. Probably a bit too small for a dining room unless it's a tiny room.
customer_reviews.author: Dickers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely elegant chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable light fixture. Very elegant and looks amazing in my closet. It’s not huge and that’s exactly what I was looking for. Such a great price I didn’t mind assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting, you will not be sorry at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lighting is absolutely gorgeous and it is very easy to assemble! Pictures do not do it any justice! Friends and family that have come over to visit and seen them both hanging on either side of my staircase have all marveled at their brilliance. Definitely a great purchase, especially for the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Truly beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: For the money (under $30), this is an amazing chandelier. Do note the measurements, it is small. And yes you do have to attach each strand of crystals yourself. But they do seem to be glass, not acrylic, and are beautifully cut. We have a small bump-out facing our back yard and this hanging light is perfect for it!
customer_reviews.author: Gutsy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: These look SO beautiful in two of our hallways. They make the house look so elegant. We used a higher wattage LED candelabra bulb because we felt the light was a little dim. Other than that, really easy to install. We put the crystals along the outer diameter on the base, hooked up the base to the ceiling, and installed the rest of the crystals while it was mounted. The crystals will break if dropped and there was only one extra strand in the box, so be careful! Really great look that was not expensive. Thanks again, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, make sure you can get the bulb
customer_reviews.text: Great product for an awesome price. Only trouble was the bulb it calls for is super uncommon (at least here in California). I finally found one that fit, but it's not very bright (250 lumens), and it cost as much as the chandelier itself. Would have gone with a different option had I known that in advance, but it's good quality and the crystals are really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: daniel A  Tonn

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you like puzzles
customer_reviews.text: This is the total opposite of easy to install. You have to attach each individual little crystal to each other as you go. Will take you forever and an eternity to finish this thing. I didn't order it for a never-ending puzzle! Returned it as a result for something simpler to install and not sometime consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Genetics

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Slightly Time-consuming to Assemble and Install
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two lights, one each for my husband's and my closets after our bathroom remodel. Assembly took a little time and patience but I was able to assemble each in about 20 minutes. My husband had a more difficult time installing them as the pendants got in the way of his work; it would probably be easier to install without the pendants, but hanging pendants after installing would be a pain. He said the second one was easier to install--learning curve, I guess. Overall, we are quite pleased with the result. We get lots of "Oohs!" when we show them off!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was so Surprised that it's real glass. it's a decent size its tedious to put on all the crystals but easy it's also easy to install it's beautiful The price is amazing they even add extra crystal and rings in case you break any Just make sure you read before you un pack I'm buying another for future replacement
customer_reviews.author: luz velasquez

customer_reviews.title: I'm the best Mom!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 30+ y.o. daughter for her birthday a couple wks ago. Every time I talk to her, she thanks me. Shes always wanted a crystal chandelier. A truly beautiful, delicate looking decoration on display that her 4 kids, 3 cats,1 dog, & husband cant break. Shes got it installed in the kitchen over the sink. She did tell me shes come up with some other places she can put this light (hint, hint)
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install - OK to Spray Paint
customer_reviews.text: Had been searching for months for a small "bronze" chandelier to match two large ones that are hanging nearby. My mom's bday was just around the corner & I wanted to buy & install a new light fixture in her entryway. Finally purchased this one because of the size & how pretty it is. Painted the base with rustoleum bronze spray paint (Leave the bolts in so they get painted too & let it dry overnight). It came out gorgeous! Matches the other two fixtures (one of the two shown in the photo's). My mom likes this one so much she wants me to purchase & install a second one in her upstairs (small) hallway to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: CynRMa

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This light is soooo amazingly beautiful! The quality is beyond what I would have imagined. I put the crystals on in a little over an hour--and yes, it is tedious but so worth it when you are through! I do not have the light hung yet, as our renovations to the bathroom are still ongoing. Do not hesitate to purchase this light. You will be completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: WOW Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cute little chandeliers are so elegant and pretty and wow make a closet look amazing. I want to get more for the house now. Price was incredible and putting together took a little time but not hard at all, kinda fun. Installing was easy. Really makes a room or closet or hallway. Very cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kuzmunich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to install. However it does not day anywhere that a standard A19 bulb will not fit. It needs a E14 bulb (like for a Xmas light or Scentsy warmer). Luckily I had a Philips Hue White Ambiance Decorative Candle 40W Dimmable LED Smart Bulb at home for a broken lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McKercher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal, and gorgeous little chandelier for my 8 year old daughters room! Great quality, would definitely buy again. We were redecorating my daughters room and had to take out her ceiling fan....this was the perfect thing to use as a replacement! She loves it and thinks it makes her room like so cool!! Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fixture
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is amazing. OMG I can't believe it was under 30 dollars. The base went up in minutes but I will say the crystals took a little longer there were around 50 or 60 crystals took me maybe 15 minutes. But well worth it. It's just beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Option
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute chandelier. It was easy to install and it looks great. It came well packaged and the instructions were easy to follow. I was able to install it by myself in about 40mins. And that includes removing the old fixture and assembling the chandelier. It looks great in my closet and provide perfect lighting. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable but feels very cheap. My infant niece grabbed one of the strands while I was assembling this and was able to pull it all completely apart. She is a BABY. They could’ve used stronger wires. Extra rings were included, and I was able to get it back together again, but it feels very delicate and cheap- not like it will hold up. It is beautiful, though, and my daughter loves it in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa E. Lehtinen

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Received this little gem and installed in the entry way. I call it an entry way, but it is small, perfect for this guy! Looks amazingly good! Much better than expected! Only problem is finding a decent bulb for it. Will support a 100W, but I could only find a 60. Still looks good!
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Hile Lighting Crystal Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Just tried to install this lighting after waiting 2+ months to have a custom Murphy bed installed for my granddaughter. The lighting looks beautiful however this product does not work at all. It shorted out the electrical system with wiring that does not match Canadian standards. And now the window to return the item has closed. Very disappointing especially for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine P James

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for the money. Looks as described and pictured in the listing. However, the plate used to hold the light in place does not have the center hole drilled as pictured. Nor were we able to buy one at Home Depot that was the right size. We are left with drilling a hole in it ourselves. Too late to take a picture of it, since we’ve already drilled it. Also allow yourself 15 to 30 minutes to attach all of the crystals. And finally, it calls for an E12 bulb, which we’ve only been able to find in 15 watt. Throws off very little light.
customer_reviews.author: Gene N.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous,small,inexpensive but tedious!
customer_reviews.text: So love this flush mount chandelier. It's beautiful in my 9yr olds room. Depending on lightbulb used it does reflect around the room and looks gorgeous. The cons it's really tedious to assemble you have to put in the crystal line one by one with this sort of a keychain like hardware. We paid less than $30 for it so we got through with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mailee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I’ve always wanted a chandelier in my closet. This is perfect!! I have a 40 watt bulb in and it’s the perfect amount of light. Some reviews recommended putting the crystals on prior to hanging it. Yes it was easier putting them on prior however it made it very heavy so you need 2 people if you think you’re going to be messing with the wires. I did it myself and it was fine but there were some choice words said and my arms were pretty tired lol. But sooo worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: ank16war

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy EVer!! Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is beautiful! I bought a similar crystal light from menards for at least 3-4x more than this and I wish I would have thought to check amazon then! Great quality, perfect packaging. To attach the strands of crystals squeeze the metal ring and it makes the two metal ends stick out, insert one into the loop in the base and it will be finished In Less than 10 min! Apparently I can’t upload pics from my iPhone gallery, but the other photos in review are accurate! Looks just like photo! Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: sandy peterson

customer_reviews.title: INSTALLED IN BATHROOM
customer_reviews.text: I cut little pieces of electrical tape and stuck it to every strand on underside of base. (To help seal for moisture in bathroom) Also I attached every strand of (plastic) crystals BEFORE the light was installed. Its pretty bright even though my picture shows dark. Its a small bathroom. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MWT

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, great deal
customer_reviews.text: Put two of these with 60W bulbs in a fairly large basement guest room (approx 9 X 14). They do a pretty good job lighting the room, though not bright enough for school work or other type tasks, but they look great and are just the right length to be attractive but not intrusive. One would not have been enough - would have looked odd/too small and would not have been enough light.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design on ceiling (shadow) - so pretty
customer_reviews.text: It took a little bit to attach all the crystals, but once I got the hang of it - it went pretty fast. It makes the coolest shadow design on the ceiling. We have this located in a little area that is basically a walk-through from main entry area to our bedroom - there is a washer and dryer there and then the door to the walk-in closet. It's smallish, but really cute and perfect for our space.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: This was absolutely adorable for my grand daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely adorable for my grand daughter's room. I removed an ugly ceiling fan. She has a small room but it is plenty of light with a 100 w LED candelabra bulb. We also added a dimmer which she thinks is the coolest. Her first reaction when it was lit in the dark was," I have a giant snowflake on my ceiling", from the reflection. Great price too. Only 4 stars because of assembly which she helped me do.
customer_reviews.author: remaloney

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret this purchase! I added these lights to my foyer hallway and it has added a sense elegance. I wish they photographed better. This photo serves no justice to the actual beauty. These are made of glass which makes them very reflective. You will have to do some assembly, but the installation is quick and easy. Also did you see the price?! Why not?!
customer_reviews.author: Caderina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO PRETTY!!! I love this light. I was concerned about assembling the crystal strands, but it was was easy! If you squeeze the rings, rather than trying to separate them, they slip right on. Beautiful hallway light! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Chandelier: Just didn’t put enough light out for the area we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: I sure hope the company sees this. My husband has gone to multiple Khol’s as this was where you said to drop the item off. Khol’s has been closed in my area for 3 week now. I don’t if under these circumstances you could extend my returning period.
customer_reviews.author: Meegan

customer_reviews.title: Just fine!
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller in size than I had expected. It takes some time to install this fixture. All the strings come unassembled and need to be installed individually. The fixture only uses one small bulb so this alone will not be enough in a decent size room. We had to supplement with a couple of lamps. It looks fine after installed and hence we left it in. It is fair value for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect touch for the space we were redoing. Brought class and elwgance to the room. I put it on a dinner as added a 60w bulb and it was crazy bright. Time and patience to put all the crystals on the base but easy and simple. Over all a fabulus purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ken

customer_reviews.title: Cute closet chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little closet chandelier. It provides adequate light for a small to medium walk-in closet. You can’t beat the price for the materials. I assembled it with ease and my husband hung it without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: 702mturner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old daughter's room. It is beautiful and the perfect size for a small bedroom. I originally bought a white bulb, but I realized a clear bulb blends in better with the crystals. We used a 60 watt bulb and it is plenty bright. When the light is on the crystals reflect beautifully on the ceiling and walls. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Okay so a few things. This piece is smaller. But it’s beautiful and perfect for a small room or closet. The crystals are annoying to put on. For the price this chandelier is beautiful and sturdy. Love it and it complete my room.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Looks great over the clawfoot tub
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this light. It was tedious hanging all the beads but not hard and worth the end result. Love the reflection on the wall and ceiling. Perfect for over my claw footed tub.
customer_reviews.author: Hugs on Lazy River

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier for a great price. I was worried it wasn’t going to look very good because of the price but it is a great purchase and I have zero regrets. It didn’t take very long to put together at all. My daughter loves it in her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier, complicated to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier, loved the end prouduct only gave 4 stars because the assembly was complicated, took two people to hang up. Came with tIny hooks that connect the crystals to base. Several broke and I was afraid I wouldn’t be able to complete the assembly. I had some thin wire from another project. Was able to use that as a replacement. It looks stunning. I love laying in bed and staring up at the beautiful crystals. Would recommend using a LED soft light.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen's reviews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture!
customer_reviews.text: This light is a beautiful for the price. Perfect for a smaller area. It took about 20 minutes to put the crystals strands on before hanging the fixture. We did spray paint the base a darker color. It fit perfectly in our RV.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Not easy
customer_reviews.text: Omg you have to attach all the crystals by hand 56! They have like a key chain ring so if you have long nails it's hassle! I'm sure it will be pretty but be ready to spend and hour or so putting the crystals on . Ugh
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: Worth the moola.
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it up and had some troubles getting the screws tight at first. I hung the crystals, which was tedious, but very doable. The overall effect when finished is lovely and eye catching. I am considering putting more of these up in other rooms, I like them that much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one bulb
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but didn’t realize or consider that there is only one lightbulb in the fixture. Had it installed in my master bedroom closet, and even with an LED bulb, it’s not bright enough. Two bulbs would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this for my daughters playhouse. I love how I was able to make it shorter to fit the small space. I also took out the electrical feature since there’s no electricity going to the playhouse and put a battery operated LED in it and it was perfect. It was better then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little light with a classic look. Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you put the largest strand first then the second largest then the small ones last. I think they should come fully assembled. That’s why the cost is low, because you have to finish building them yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping girl

customer_reviews.title: The picture doesn't do justice on how beautiful this is
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't do justice on how beautiful this is. It's quite small but the effect it leaves on the ceiling and room - just beautiful. Very happy customer. It took me a while to put the thing together. My husband installed it in a few minutes. Noticed the crystal in the middle isn't centered but I don't know how I can fix that. Other than that it's perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks really pretty and I love it. Especially for the price. It was really Tesoro put together because all of the crystal strands had to be attached, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kemmerre

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: My friends couldn't believe how cheap this light was. They thought I paid much more for it. The only negative is hanging each crystal strand. It took tons of patience and a sore neck to complete the project.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture with or without the light on.
customer_reviews.text: Do not let the price fool you! Nice weighted frame, individual crystals reflect light extremely well. Purchased two for my upstairs hallway and it illuminates just the right amount of light. Easy to install, the individual crystals took some time but so worth it! Found similar fixtures at Home Depot for twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping2do

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I’m please as to how it brightens my closet and makes it so glamorous. It took quite some time putting all the crystals on each layer. It was obviously not that bad because I brought another for my entry way in from the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Karima Elamin

customer_reviews.title: Great value beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous chandelier for the price it is so gorgeous my husband bought it I put it together and installed it when I searched I searched for bathroom and it didnt say in description either way but instructions say not recommended for bathroom due to not moisture resistant but I installed over my sink
customer_reviews.author: acsmith70

customer_reviews.title: Subtle beauty for a fraction of the attraction
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice touch, for very low price. Casts lovely bursts of light and shaddow. Emphasizes the texture of the Venitian plaster walls, and sprays a burst of light on the tray ceiling-drawing the eye up. Very nice choice for so little cash. Fixture looks like I spent hundreds. Many complements. Connected to hall sensor, it pops on, and baths the hallway with subtle beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael the designer

product_meta.title: Hile Lighting KU300074 Modern Chandelier Crystal Ball Fixture Pendant Ceiling Lamp H10.43" X W8.66", 1 Light
product_meta.description:
Style: Simple/Modern
Number of Bulbs: 1
Wattage:E12 Max 100W (Bulb not Included)
Net Weight(kg): 1.5
Suggested Room Fit: Aisle,Corridor,Balcony,Bar,Stairwells,Small Room
Suggested Room Size: 5-8㎡
Do cut off the power before installation to avoid electric shock!
feature_bullets: Need assembly and Easy to Install
QUALITY ASSURANCE, easy and fast replacement is offered if any quality issue,please feel free to contact us.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,924 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
